General

  • Installation

    cwc makes it easy for you to start developing your second screen applications. We have developed the framework so that minimal setup is required but hightly customisable.

  • Connecting

    When you have installed the cwc node server, connecting clinet so that they can shear bidrectinal data can be acomplised is just a few steps.

  • Hooks

    Hooks are the building blocks of the cwc object allowing everything to connect by providing a way of defining callback functionality for series of events. Hooks can also be used to invoke hooks created on clients within the same cluster group.

Components

  • Viewport Scroll

  • Pullbars

    Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry’s standard dummy text ever since the 1500s

  • Navgroup & Navitems

    The Navgroup is a flexible, powerful component for navigation around big screen experience. You can quickly build simply to complex navigation structure to your application, allowing your users move around freely using keyboard events.

  • Gesture Pad

    4 or 8 way directional touch or swipe pad, perfect if you need more dynamic movement around around your application.

  • Directional pad

    A 1-way or 5-way Directional pad is perfect for games movement, user interfaces or if you want to have 4 buttons on a controller.

  • Analog controller

Documentation

Gesture Pad

last updated: Jan 24, 2016

4 or 8 way directional touch or swipe pad, perfect if you need more dynamic movement around around your application.

HTML markup

Elements with an attribute of data-cwc-controller=“gesture-pad" applied to them will be treated as a Gesture Pad component by the cwc object.

Add a the cwc style to your Gesture Pad with the .cwc-style class.

JavaScript Declaration

cwc.ControllerMaster({}) must be included and the GesturePadController({}) has to be initiated after the DOM has finished loading.

Gesture Pad Instructions

Additional settings can be added to each Gesture Pad through the use of the data-cwc-instructions data attribute to support more sophisticated features.

Instructions Types Descriptions
movement-type Sting How you want your users to intract with the Gesture Pad.
on-movement Hook Prvideo the name of the hook you wish to run when moving.

Movement type

You can change the way the user interacts with the Gesture Pad by setting the movement-type property within the data instructions attribute.

Instruction Type Value
movement-type Sting pan or touch

Pan

Recognised when the pointer is down and moved in the allowed direction.

Swipe

Recognised when the pointer is down and moved has finded.

HTML

On move

You can spesify a callback function to be called for when the component is moving. By providing a Hook for the on on-move parameter.

Instruction Type Value
on-move Hook d-hook:cwc:navgroup-action, d-hook:, hook:

HTML

When the hook is invoked by the on-move method of the Gesture Pad feedback information is passed back into that hooks method. Feedback information can be found here Controller returned inputdata.
